author: Nintendo of America
description:
LEGO Voyagers is available now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/lego-voyagers-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 
 
Tumble, jump, snap together, and build your way through rich brick worlds! From the makers of LEGO Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams, ultimately learning the value of being connected.
 
LEGO Voyagers asks open questions about building friendships, sharing dreams, and giving space. It reminds us that while playing and being creative is for all shapes and sizes, it’s always better when you share it with a friend!
 
#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #LEGOVoyagers

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
title: LEGO Voyagers – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
